member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the ALTO (Analyzed Layout and Text Object) format.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AltoXmlDocumentOptions class.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.ApplicationDescription
member.summary: Application description setting for the ALTO document.
member.value: The application description setting for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.DocumentResolution
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.DocumentResolution.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.DocumentResolution.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.EmptyPageHeight
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.EmptyPageHeight.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.EmptyPageHeight.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.EmptyPageResolution
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.EmptyPageResolution.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.EmptyPageResolution.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.EmptyPageWidth
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.EmptyPageWidth.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.EmptyPageWidth.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.FileName
member.summary: File name for the ALTO document.
member.value: A The file name for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.FirstPhysicalPageNumber
member.summary: First physical page number setting for the ALTO document.
member.value: The first physical page number setting for the ALTO document. Default value is 1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.AltoXml.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.Format.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.Format.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Formatted
member.summary: Produce a formatted XML document.
member.value: **true** to produce a formatted XML document, otherwise; **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.Indentation
member.summary: Indentation string to use when producing a formatted XML document.
member.value: The indentation string to use when producing a formatted XML document.. Default value is a tab character.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.MaintainAspectRatio
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.MaintainAspectRatio.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.MaintainAspectRatio.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.MeasurementUnit
member.summary: Measurement unit for the ALTO document.
member.value: The measurement unit for the ALTO document. Default value is AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.MM10

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.AltoXmlDocumentOptions.PageRestriction
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.PageRestriction.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.PageRestriction.

member.summary: Processing agency for the ALTO document.
member.value: The processing agency for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.summary: Processing date/time for the ALTO document.
member.value: The processing date/time for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.value: The Processing step description for the ALTO document. Default value is **null**.

member.summary: Processing step settings for the ALTO document.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocDocumentOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options to use when saving a document using the Microsoft Word 2003 document format (DOC) format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocDocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocDocumentOptions class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocDocumentOptions.DropObjects
member.summary: Controls which object types to drop from the final document.
member.value: Controls which object types to drop from the final document. The default value is DocumentDropObjects.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Doc.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocDocumentOptions.TextMode
member.summary: Controls how and when to frames the text blocks in the resulting DOC file.
member.value: Controls how and when to frames the text blocks in the resulting DOC file. Default value is DocumentTextMode.Auto.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmfPage
member.summary: Data for one Windows Enhanced Metafile (WMF) page to be added to a document file.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmfPage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocumentEmfPage class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmfPage.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentEmfPage

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmfPage.AnnotationContainer
member.summary: LEADTOOLS Annotation container that contains the objects to use when annotating a page in PDF documents.
member.value: An optional Object that must point to a valid instance of AnnContainer class containing the objects to use when annotating a page in PDF documents. Default value is null (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmfPage.EmfHandle
member.summary: The Windows Enhanced Meta File handle representation of the page.
member.value: An IntPtr structure that contains the unmanaged handle to the Windows Enhanced Meta File object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmfPage.Image
member.summary: The image used for creating a PDF document page with the image and text overlay feature.
member.value: A RasterImage that contains the optional raster image to use to create a PDF page with the image/text overlay feature. If this feature is not used, this property must be set to **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmfPage.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of this document page.
member.value: The type of this document page (DocumentPageType.Emf).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmptyPage
member.summary: Data for one empty page to be added to a document file.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmptyPage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocumentEmptyPage class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmptyPage.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentEmptyPage

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmptyPage.Height
member.summary: Page height in inches.
member.value: Page height in inches. Default value is 11.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmptyPage.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of this document page.
member.value: The type of this document page (DocumentPageType.Empty).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentEmptyPage.Width
member.summary: Page width in inches.
member.value: Page width in inches. Default value is 8.5.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions
member.summary: Abstract base class that provides functionality common to all the format option classes in the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.DocumentResolution
member.summary: Document resolution (in dots per inch) of the resulting document.
member.value: Document resolution value given in dots per inch unit and it controls the dimensions of the resulting document. Default value is 0 (use the resolution of the actual page).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.EmptyPageHeight
member.summary: Document empty page height.
member.value: A double value that indicates the height of an empty page in inches. Default value is 11.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.EmptyPageResolution
member.summary: Resolution (in dots per inch) of the document empty page.
member.value: Document resolution value given in dots per inch unit and it controls the dimensions of the empty page. Default value is 0 (use the current screen resolution).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.EmptyPageWidth
member.summary: Document empty page width.
member.value: A double value that indicates the width of an empty page in inches. Default value is 8.5

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return the DocumentFormat associated with the derived class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.MaintainAspectRatio
member.summary: Maintain the aspect ratio of the original emf file.
member.value: **true** to maintain the aspect so the created document will have the same aspect ratio of the original emf file; **false**, otherwise.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions.PageRestriction
member.summary: Indicates whether there can be blank pages and overlay images.
member.value: A DocumentPageRestriction enumeration member that specifies the current document page restriction.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentPage
member.summary: Data for one page to be added to a document file.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentPage.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentPage

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentPage.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of this document page.
member.value: The type of this document page.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentProgressEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the DocumentWriter.Progress event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentProgressEventArgs.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new DocumentProgressEventArgs object with given parameters.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentProgressEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Allow the user to cancel the current operation.
member.value: **true** to cancel the current operation; **false** to continue the current operation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentProgressEventArgs.Percentage
member.summary: Gets the value, in percent, of the completion for the current operation.
member.value: A number between 0 and 100 that indicates in percent how close to finishing the current operation is.

member.value: An RasterImage that contains the image representation of the page.

member.summary: Gets the type of this document page.
member.value: The type of this document page (DocumentPageType.Raster).

member.summary: Custom page height in inches.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentSvgPage.Image
member.summary: The image used for creating a PDF document page with the image and text overlay feature.
member.value: A RasterImage that contains the optional raster image to use to create a PDF page with the image/text overlay feature. If this feature is not used, this property must be set to **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentSvgPage.SvgDocument
member.summary: The SVG document representation of the page.
member.value: An SvgDocument that contains the SVG document representation of the page.

member.summary: Gets the type of this document page.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter
member.summary: Support for creating document files such as PDF, XPS, DOC, HTML, RTF, or Text from Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), Windows Enhanced Meta Files (EMF) or raster images.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the DocumentWriter class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.AddPage(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentPage)
member.summary: Adds a new page to current document being created.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.AppendLtd(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends one LEADTOOLS Temporary Document (LTD) file to another.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.BeginDocument(System.String,Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Creates a new document and prepares it for the new pages to be added.
member.param: The name of new document file.
The format of the new document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.Convert(System.String,System.String,Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Converts a document from the LEADTOOLS Temporary Document format to any of the formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writer.
member.param: The name of an existing LEADTOOLS Temporary Document Format file on disk.
The name of the converted document file to be created.
The format of the converted document file to be created. This parameter cannot be DocumentFormat.Ltd.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.EndDocument
member.summary: Finalize the document being created on disk.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.GetFormatFileExtension(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Gets the default file extension for the specified document format.
member.returns: A String containing the file extension for the specified format (without the ".").

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.GetFormatFriendlyName(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Gets the friendly name of the specified document format.
member.returns: A String containing the friendly name for the specified format.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.GetOptions(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Gets the extra options to use when saving a document using the specified format.
member.returns: The document options for this format. Note that the returned object from the base DocumentOptions class needs to be cast to one of the derived classes based on \format\.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.GetOptions(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentFormat)
member.summary: Gets the extra options to use when saving a document using the specified format.
member.returns: The document options for this format. Note that the returned object from the DocumentOptions interface needs to be cast to one of the derived classes based on \format\.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.GetSupportedFormats
member.summary: Gets an array containing the supported formats.
member.returns: An array containing the supported formats.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.InsertPage(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentPage,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts a new page to current document being created.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.LoadOptions(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads the document options from an XML stream.
member.param: A standard .NET Stream containing the options.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.LoadOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the document options from an XML file on disk.
member.param: The name of XML file containing the options.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.SaveOptions(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the document options to an XML stream.
member.param: A standard .NET Stream to save the options to.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.SaveOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the document options to an XML file on disk.
member.param: The name of XML file to save the options to.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.SetOptions(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentFormat,Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions)
member.summary: Sets the extra options to use when saving a document using the specified format.
member.param: An instance of an object derived from DocumentOptions. The remarks section lists the various document formats and the derived object that can be used.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.SetOptions(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentFormat,Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentOptions)
member.summary: Sets the extra options to use when saving a document using the specified format.
member.param: An instance of an object that implements DocumentOptions. The remarks section lists the various document formats and the derived object that can be used.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.DocumentWriter.UpdateMetaFileResolution(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the resolution of an existing Windows Enhanced Metafile (EMF).
member.returns: A handle to the modified Windows Enhanced Metafile (EMF).

member.summary: Document writer progress notification event.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HtmlDocumentOptions class.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.HtmlDocumentOptions.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Background color.
member.value: A RasterColor structure that contains the background color to use in the final HTML document. Default value is "White".

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.HtmlDocumentOptions.DocumentType
member.summary: Type of the HTML file created using the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.
member.value: One of the HtmlDocumentType enumeration members that indicate which type of HTML file the resulting HTML file will be.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.HtmlDocumentOptions.DropObjects
member.summary: Controls which object types to drop from the final document.
member.value: Controls which object types to drop from the final document. The default value is DocumentDropObjects.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.HtmlDocumentOptions.FontEmbedMode
member.summary: Font embedding mode used when creating an HTML document.
member.value: One of the DocumentFontEmbedMode enumeration members that indicate which font embedding mode to use when creating an HTML document. Default value is DocumentFontEmbedMode.Auto.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.HtmlDocumentOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets the document format type associated with this options class.
member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Html.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.HtmlDocumentOptions.UseBackgroundColor
member.summary: Indicates whether the HTML document will use the a background color or not.
member.value: **true** to use the background color in the HTML document; **false**, otherwise.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this DocumentOptions

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Clone
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.AnnotationsEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether annotations and comments can be added to the resulting PDF document.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to add annotations and comments to the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.AssemblyEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether pages can be added or removed from the resulting PDF document.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to add or remove pages from the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Author
member.summary: Author value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains the PDF document author (the name of the person who created the document) to be used. To reset the author value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.AutoBookmarks
member.summary: List of the current auto bookmarks options.
member.value: A list of PdfAutoBookmark that represent the auto-bookmarking settings used when creating PDF documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.AutoBookmarksEnabled
member.summary: Use automatic bookmarking in the final PDF document
member.value: **true** to allow bookmarks to be created using automatic bookmarking, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.CenterWindow
member.summary: Indicates if the initial view should center the document in the window
member.value: **true** if initial view should center the document in the window, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.ColoredImageCompression
member.summary: Type of compression to use on colored images when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the ColoredImageCompressionType enumeration members that indicate which type of compression to use on colored images when creating a PDF document. The default value is ColoredImageCompressionType.FlateJpeg.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.CopyEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting PDF document has access rights to copy text.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to copy text from the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Creator
member.summary: Creator value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A string which contains the PDF document's creator (the name of the person who created the document) to be used. To reset the creator value, use either an

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.CustomBookmarks
member.summary: List of the custom (user) bookmarks to use when creating PDF documents.
member.value: A list of PdfCustomBookmark that represent the custom (user) bookmarks to add to the final PDF document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.DisplayDocTitle
member.summary: Indicates that the initial view should display the document title.
member.value: **true** if the initial view should display the document title, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.DocumentResolution
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.DocumentResolution.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.DocumentResolution.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.DocumentType
member.summary: PDF file type created using the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.
member.value: One of the PdfDocumentType enumeration members that indicate which type of PDF file will be created. Default value is PdfDocumentType.Pdf

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.DropObjects
member.summary: Controls which object types to drop from the final document.
member.value: Controls which object types to drop from the final document. The default value is DocumentDropObjects.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.EditEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting PDF document can be edited.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to edit the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.summary: Encryption mode to use when creating the PDF document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.FitWindow
member.summary: Indicates if the initial view should fit the document in the window
member.value: **true** if initial view should fit the document in the window, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.FontEmbedMode
member.summary: Font embedding mode used when creating an PDF document.
member.value: One of the DocumentFontEmbedMode enumeration members that indicate which font embedding mode to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is DocumentFontEmbedMode.Auto.

member.value: This property will always return DocumentFormat.Pdf.

member.summary: Indicates whether the initial view should hide the menu bar
member.value: **true** if the initial view should hide the menu bar, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.HideToolbar
member.summary: Indicates whether the initial view should hide the toolbar
member.value: **true** if the initial view should hide the toolbar, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.HideWindowUI
member.summary: Indicates whether the initial view should hide the window user interface elements
member.value: **true** if the initial view should hide the window user interface elements, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.HighQualityPrintEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting PDF document can be printed in high quality.
member.value: **true** to allow allow external viewers and editors to print the resulting PDF document in high quality, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.ImageOverText
member.summary: Use a raster image overlay on top of the resulting PDF document.
member.value: **true** to use a raster image overlay on top of the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.ImageOverTextMode
member.summary: Indicates how the document writer converts the overlay image (image over text).
member.value: A value that indicates how the document writer converts the overlay image (image over text). Default value is DocumentImageOverTextMode.Strict

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.ImageOverTextSize
member.summary: Resize options for the overlay image (image over text).
member.value: A value that indicates the resize options for the overlay image (image over text). Default value is DocumentImageOverTextSize.Original

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.InitialPageNumber
member.summary: Initial view page number to use when creating a PDF document.
member.value: The initial view page number to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is 0 (go to the first page).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Keywords
member.summary: Keywords to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains the keywords associated with the PDF document. To reset the keywords value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Linearized
member.summary: Create a PDF document that is optimized for fast web viewing.
member.value: **true** to create a PDF document optimized for fast web viewing, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.MaintainAspectRatio
member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.MaintainAspectRatio.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.MaintainAspectRatio.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.OneBitImageCompression
member.summary: One bit compression type used to compress one bit per pixel images when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the OneBitImageCompressionType enumeration members that indicate which one bit compression type to use for compressing one bit per pixel images when creating a PDF document. The default value is OneBitImageCompressionType.Jbig2.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.OwnerPassword
member.summary: Owner password value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String that contains the user password value to be used. To reset the owner password, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.PageFitType
member.summary: Initial view page fit type when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the PdfDocumentPageFitType enumeration members that indicate the initial view page fit type mode to use when creating a PDF document. The default value is PdfDocumentPageFitType.Default.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.PageLayoutType
member.summary: Initial view page layout type when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the PdfDocumentPageLayoutType enumeration members that indicate the initial view layout of page mode to use when creating a PDF document. The default value is PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.SinglePageDisplay.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.PageModeType
member.summary: Initial view page mode type when creating a PDF document.
member.value: One of the PdfDocumentPageModeType enumeration members that indicate the initial view page mode type to use to use when creating a PDF document. The default value is PdfDocumentPageModeType.PageOnly.

member.summary: This class implementation of DocumentOptions.PageRestriction.
member.value: Refer to DocumentOptions.PageRestriction.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.PrintEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the resulting PDF document has access rights to allow printing.
member.value: **true** to allow external viewers and editors to print the resulting PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Producer
member.summary: Producer value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A string which contains the PDF document's producer (the name of the person who created the document) to be used. To reset the producer value, use either an

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Protected
member.summary: Create a protected PDF document.
member.value: **true** to create a protected PDF document, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.QualityFactor
member.summary: Degree of loss in the compression process. This applies to JPEG compression only.
member.value: A QualityFactor determines the degree of loss in the compression process. The default value is 80.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Subject
member.summary: Subject value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains the PDF document subject to be used. To reset the subject value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.Title
member.summary: Title value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains the PDF document title to be used. To reset the title value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.TotalBookmarkLevels
member.summary: Total number of bookmark levels for created PDF documents.
member.value: A TotalBookmarkLevels determines the total number of bookmark levels for created PDF documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.UserPassword
member.summary: User password value to be used in the resulting PDF document.
member.value: A String that contains the user password value to be used. To reset the user password, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.XCoordinate
member.summary: Initial view X coordinate position of the page to use when creating a PDF document.
member.value: The initial view X coordinate position of the page to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is 0 (left of the page).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.YCoordinate
member.summary: Initial view Y coordinate position of the page to use when creating a PDF document.
member.value: The initial view Y coordinate position of the page to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is 0 (top of the page).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfDocumentOptions.ZoomPercent
member.summary: Initial view zoom percentage to use when creating a PDF document.
member.value: The initial view zoom percentage to use when creating a PDF document. Default value is 0 (actual size).

member.summary: ALTO (Analyzed Layout and Text Object) is an XML Schema used by the library of congress to describe OCR text and layout format.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfAutoBookmark
member.summary: Options to use when creating bookmarks in automatic way based on font information of the document when creating Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfAutoBookmark.BoldStyle
member.summary: Indicates that bookmarks should be created based on whether the font is bold.
member.value: **true** to create bookmarks based on whether the font is bold, otherwise; **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfAutoBookmark.FontFaceName
member.summary: Typeface name of the font to be considered for the font which will be used for creation bookmark in the PDF document.
member.value: A String which contains typeface name of the font which is used to determine the selected font for creation bookmark. To reset this value, use either an empty string or **null**. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfAutoBookmark.FontHeight
member.summary: Font height to be considered for the font which will be used when creating bookmarks in the PDF document.
member.value: A FontHeight double value that indicates the font height. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfAutoBookmark.ItalicStyle
member.summary: Consider italic font style for the selected font while creating bookmark in the PDF document.
member.value: **true** to consider only italic font for the selected font type and size while creating bookmark in the PDF document; **false**, otherwise. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfAutoBookmark.UseStyles
member.summary: Consider font styles when creating bookmarks in the PDF document.
member.value: **true** to allow checking for font styles such as bold or italic while creating the bookmark in the PDF document using the automatic bookmarking feature, otherwise; **false** The default value is **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfCustomBookmark
member.summary: Options to use when creating custom bookmarks based when creating Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfCustomBookmark.LevelNumber
member.summary: Level number of bookmark item to be created in bookmark for the created PDF document.
member.value: The level number of the bookmark item inside PDF bookmark. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfCustomBookmark.Name
member.summary: Name of this bookmark item.
member.value: A String which contains the name of this bookmark item. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfCustomBookmark.PageNumber
member.summary: Page number this custom bookmark refer to in the created PDF document.
member.value: The page number where this custom bookmark item refer to. Must be value greater or equal to 1 and less or equal to the total number of pages in the final PDF document. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfCustomBookmark.XCoordinate
member.summary: Horizontal coordinate in points of this bookmark item in the PDF page.
member.value: The horizontal coordinate of this bookmark item in points in the PDF page. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentWriters.PdfCustomBookmark.YCoordinate
member.summary: Vertical coordinate in points of this bookmark item in the PDF page.
member.value: The vertical coordinate of this bookmark item in points in the PDF page. Default value is 0.
